entries.title: Senate Dems propose ban on presidents investing or endorsing crypto assets
entries.author: Tina Nguyen
entries.original_content: After abruptly pulling their support from what would have been the Senate’s first stablecoin regulatory bill, Senate Democrats announced Tuesday that they would introduce a new bill that would prevent federal officials and their families from issuing digital assets – a bill directed at Donald Trump and his family’s current stablecoin and meme coin holdings. […]
entries.textrank_summary: After abruptly pulling their support from what would have been the Senate’s first stablecoin regulatory bill, Senate Democrats announced Tuesday that they would introduce a new bill that would prevent federal officials and their families from issuing digital assets – a bill directed at Donald Trump and his family’s current stablecoin and meme coin holdings. […]
entries.bart_summary: Senate Democrats announced Tuesday that they would introduce a new bill that would prevent federal officials and their families from issuing digital assets. The bill is directed at Donald Trump and his family’s current stablecoin and meme coin holdings.
entries.hybrid_summary: Senate Democrats announced Tuesday that they would introduce a new bill that would prevent federal officials and their families from issuing digital assets. The bill is directed at Donald Trump and his family’s current stablecoin and meme coin holdings.

entries.title: Amazon’s Zoox issued a robotaxi software recall after a crash in Las Vegas
entries.author: Umar Shakir
entries.original_content: Amazon-owned Zoox says it issued a software recall for all 270 of its vehicles after an unoccupied robotaxi in Las Vegas crashed into a passenger vehicle on April 8th, Reuters reports. The update rolled out between April 16th and 17th to address a risky situation that could arise when the vehicle operating at over 40mph […]
entries.textrank_summary: Amazon-owned Zoox says it issued a software recall for all 270 of its vehicles after an unoccupied robotaxi in Las Vegas crashed into a passenger vehicle on April 8th, Reuters reports. The update rolled out between April 16th and 17th to address a risky situation that could arise when the vehicle operating at over 40mph […]
entries.bart_summary: Zoox issued a software recall for all 270 of its vehicles after an unoccupied robotaxi in Las Vegas crashed into a passenger vehicle on April 8th. The update rolled out between April 16th and 17th.
entries.hybrid_summary: Zoox issued a software recall for all 270 of its vehicles after an unoccupied robotaxi in Las Vegas crashed into a passenger vehicle on April 8th. The update rolled out between April 16th and 17th.

entries.title: The best fitness trackers to buy right now
entries.author: Victoria Song
entries.original_content: Fitness trackers have come a long way from the simple bands that tracked steps and little else. Modern trackers can monitor everything from your heart health to how well you’ve recovered from a hard bout of training. Even flagship smartwatches, which used to be lackluster trackers, have become pretty adept workout companions. Whatever your fitness […]
entries.textrank_summary: Fitness trackers have come a long way from the simple bands that tracked steps and little else. Modern trackers can monitor everything from your heart health to how well you’ve recovered from a hard bout of training. Even flagship smartwatches, which used to be lackluster trackers, have become pretty adept workout companions.
entries.bart_summary: Fitness trackers have come a long way from the simple bands that tracked steps and little else. Modern trackers can monitor everything from your heart health to how well you’ve recovered from a hard bout of training.
entries.hybrid_summary: Fitness trackers have come a long way from the simple bands that tracked steps and little else. Modern trackers can monitor everything from your heart health to how well you’ve recovered from a hard bout of training.
